tns:Request.tns:content: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:urn="urn:http.service.calendar.portlet.liferay.com" xmlns:soapenc="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <urn:addEvent soapenv:encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"> <title xsi:type="xsd:string">{$title}</title> <description xsi:type="xsd:string">{$description}</description> <location xsi:type="xsd:string"></location> <startDateMonth xsi:type="xsd:int">{$startDateMonth}</startDateMonth> <startDateDay xsi:type="xsd:int">{$startDateDay}</startDateDay> <startDateYear xsi:type="xsd:int">{$startDateYear}</startDateYear> <startDateHour xsi:type="xsd:int">10</startDateHour> <startDateMinute xsi:type="xsd:int">0</startDateMinute> <endDateMonth xsi:type="xsd:int">{$endDateMonth}</endDateMonth> <endDateDay xsi:type="xsd:int">{$endDateDay}</endDateDay> <endDateYear xsi:type="xsd:int">{$endDateYear}</endDateYear> <durationHour xsi:type="xsd:int">1</durationHour> <durationMinute xsi:type="xsd:int">0</durationMinute> <allDay xsi:type="xsd:boolean">false</allDay> <timeZoneSensitive xsi:type="xsd:boolean">false</timeZoneSensitive> <type xsi:type="xsd:string">reunion</type> <repeating xsi:type="xsd:boolean">false</repeating> <remindBy xsi:type="xsd:int">1</remindBy> <firstReminder xsi:type="xsd:int">900000</firstReminder> <secondReminder xsi:type="xsd:int">300000</secondReminder> <serviceContext xsi:type="ser:ServiceContext" xmlns:ser="http://service.portal.liferay.com"> <scopeGroupId xsi:type="xsd:long">{$groupId}</scopeGroupId> </serviceContext> </urn:addEvent> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:urn="urn:http.service.calendar.portlet.liferay.com" xmlns:soapenc="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <urn:updateEvent soapenv:encodingStyle="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/"> <eventId xsi:type="xsd:long">{$eventId}</eventId> <title xsi:type="xsd:string">{$title}</title> <description xsi:type="xsd:string">{$description}</description> <location xsi:type="xsd:string"></location> <startDateMonth xsi:type="xsd:int">{$startDateMonth}</startDateMonth> <startDateDay xsi:type="xsd:int">{$startDateDay}</startDateDay> <startDateYear xsi:type="xsd:int">{$startDateYear}</startDateYear> <startDateHour xsi:type="xsd:int">10</startDateHour> <startDateMinute xsi:type="xsd:int">10</startDateMinute> <endDateMonth xsi:type="xsd:int">{$endDateMonth}</endDateMonth> <endDateDay xsi:type="xsd:int">{$endDateDay}</endDateDay> <endDateYear xsi:type="xsd:int">{$endDateYear}</endDateYear> <durationHour xsi:type="xsd:int">10</durationHour> <durationMinute xsi:type="xsd:int">10</durationMinute> <allDay xsi:type="xsd:boolean">false</allDay> <timeZoneSensitive xsi:type="xsd:boolean">false</timeZoneSensitive> <type xsi:type="xsd:string">event</type> <repeating xsi:type="xsd:boolean">false</repeating> <recurrence xsi:type="cal:TZSRecurrence" xmlns:cal="http://cal.kernel.portal.liferay.com"> </recurrence> <remindBy xsi:type="xsd:int">0</remindBy> <firstReminder xsi:type="xsd:int">900000</firstReminder> <secondReminder xsi:type="xsd:int">300000</secondReminder> <serviceContext xsi:type="ser:ServiceContext" xmlns:ser="http://service.portal.liferay.com"> </serviceContext> </urn:updateEvent> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
